text: You have developed a web application that uses multiple EC2 Servers. How can you ensure that your app remains highly available and automatically scales?

answers.text: Use Elastic Load Balancer to distribute traffic to available, healthy instances.
Use a mix of EC2 Spot Instances and Reserved Instances.
Use EBS and CloudFront to help with scalability.
Use Auto Scaling Groups to scale a number of instances.
Use API Gateway to handle the variable number of requests coming in.
